user.title: Set up Better ToDo
user.description: Create a new Better ToDo list. On first setup, a 'Shopping List' will be created automatically.

data_description.name: Enter a name for your todo list (default: 'Tasks')

abort.already_configured: This list name is already configured.

init.title: Configure Better ToDo
init.description: Update the Better ToDo list configuration

set_task_recurrence.name: Set task recurrence
set_task_recurrence.description: Configure recurrence settings for a task

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The todo list entity containing the task

task_uid.name: Task UID
task_uid.description: The unique identifier of the task

recurrence_enabled.name: Enable recurrence
recurrence_enabled.description: Enable or disable recurrence for this task

recurrence_end_enabled.name: Enable recurrence end
recurrence_end_enabled.description: Enable or disable a limit for recurrence

recurrence_end_count.name: Recurrence end count
recurrence_end_count.description: Number of times to repeat the task

recurrence_end_date.name: Recurrence end date
recurrence_end_date.description: Date when to stop repeating the task

get_task_recurrence.name: Get task recurrence
get_task_recurrence.description: Refresh and retrieve recurrence settings for all tasks. Data is available in the entity's 'recurrence_data' attribute.

apply_recurrence_from_ui.name: Apply recurrence from UI
apply_recurrence_from_ui.description: Apply recurrence settings from the helper entities to the specified task. This service reads the task UID, interval, unit, and end settings from the helper entities.
